content.question: The work shown is an example of

choices.label: a reliquary that would have contained sacred remains
an ornate fibula, like those found in Lombardic graves
a carved pyxis, which once held containers of fragrant perfume
an enconchado luxury good meant to be used as a diplomatic gift

content.answer: a carved pyxis, which once held containers of fragrant perfume

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
